comments.comments_text: Kingsley Coman (Bayern Munich) receives a harsh yellow card from the referee after committing a minor foul on his opponent.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) receives a harsh yellow card from the referee after committing a minor foul on his opponent.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from Lucas Alario (Bayer Leverkusen). Julian Baumgartlinger plays a fantastic through ball and finds Lucas Alario (Bayer Leverkusen), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). [PLAYER] plays a fantastic through ball and finds [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the bottom left corner. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Nadiem Amiri (Bayer Leverkusen) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) will take the corner.

comments.comments_text: Kingsley Coman (Bayern Munich) collects a sweet pass and fires a shot inside the right post. What a brilliant shot!

comments.comments_text: Nadiem Amiri (Bayer Leverkusen) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Manuel Grafe had an easy-decision to make.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is booked after bringing down an opponent. [REFEREE] had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) has tested the patience of referee Manuel Grafe and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has tested the patience of referee [REFEREE] and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Karim Bellarabi (Bayer Leverkusen) was quite harsh and Manuel Grafe didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Leon Bailey (Bayer Leverkusen) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger. The ball goes out of play. Bayer Leverkusen are awarded a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger. The ball goes out of play. [TEAM] are awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Leon Bailey (Bayer Leverkusen) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.

comments.comments_text: What a beauty from just outside the box! Leon Goretzka (Bayern Munich) lashed the ball with incredible pace and power into the bottom right corner.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Joshua Kimmich finds Serge Gnabry (Bayern Munich) on the edge of the area, he times his run to perfection and beautifully chips the ball over the goalkeeper. 1:3.
